Item 49: "Все захлопали в ладоши. Кто-то крикнул:" No mention of Znayka or professor here. Just a crowd clapping and someone shouting. Doesn't fit the context.

Item 50: "– Долой Звёздочкина!" Again, dialogue, mentions Zvёzdочкин (professor's name?), but no Znayka here. So no mention of Znayka sarcastically commenting on the professor's situation.

Wait, the task says "sarcastically commenting on the professor being stuck in the Moon's center." The current batch items don't have any mention of the professor being stuck in the Moon's center.
